events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it does not fit at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized as Refund due to the customer's request for a return and refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry the jacket didn’t work out. I’ll assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the item is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket has not been worn and is still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid shipping label for the return and process your refund once we receive the item.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and for covering the return shipping costs.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you; please use it to send back the jacket and your refund will be processed promptly.
We’re following up to confirm that you received the refund after returning the jacket. Please let us know if any further assistance is needed.
Since your refund was processed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us.
